div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Nov. 2, 1907. [JEWISH ORPHAN SOCIETY MEETS]

body.p: The annual meeting of the Jewish Orphan Society was held at the Standard Club on Oct. 27, 1907. The president, Mr. Henry D Frank, submitted the annual report.
For the maintenance of eighten orphans in the past year $2,090.00 was expended or about $116.00 for each child.
The Corooran property has been disposed of for $2,300.00. Deducting commission and attorneys' fees a profit of several hundred dollors was realized on the original investment.
